ygData.subject: Re: Bard Only Equipment
ygData.msgSnippet: ... days ... Orrrr, another factor is when a bunch of people start feeding off each others complaints, the volume slowly growing in a feedback loop. As with
ygData.messageBody:
>It is another factor. Its called saturation. It can rain a little for
days
>and no one complains that two hours of rain each nite is too much. Until
>the ground gets saturated and the next days two hours of rain flood 1000
>people out of their homes.

Orrrr, another factor is when a bunch of people start feeding off each
others complaints, the volume slowly growing in a feedback loop. As with any
feeback loop, the volume doesn't grow because of more imput, say from more
and more people complaining, but from the reprocessed and reprocessed
complaints of a few. Once the signal gets going it seems obvious that there
is a problem, because obviously the volume is growing, when the real problem
is the retention and rehashing of of the same information.

Tszaaz E'Taurguin
